MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL72 postcode area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified broken equipment on our overhead line network and we now expect your supply to be restored by 2:30AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57 PM on Friday, 19 March 2021.
